components.html: If you work for an agency or arm's length body, you must report an incident on your local intranet.

You can use this form to report a security incident, for example:

- loss of personal information
- a lost or stolen device, like a laptop or mobile
- unauthorised access to IT systems or documents
- items left unsecured, like a key cabinet
- suspicious people, vehicles or packages

To report a security incident, you need to:

- [complete this form](#)
- email it to [security@justice.gov.uk](#)

You can also [report a security incident anonymously](/). 

If the incident happened outside of normal working hours, you can report it by calling 0800 917 5148.

Read about [protecting personal information](#) at the MoJ.
